description: This file defines a React functional component named SectionHeader that renders a UI section header with title, optional subtitle, optional meta badge, and an optional call-to-action element. It imports React and a Badge component, and exports SectionHeader both as a named export and as the default export.

methods.name: SectionHeader
methods.description: React functional component rendering a section header with title, optional subtitle, optional meta badge, and optional CTA.
